sections.title: Webcam
sections.content: Currently not working, and will be responsible for errors in your log related to intel_vsc, int3472-discrete, and intel-ipu6. Some of these errors can be removed by disabling the webcam in the UEFI firmware. See here for a discussion of this issue.

sections.content:
Note: **This article or section needs expansion.** This article or section needs expansion.

This article or section needs expansion.

Ensure Sound Open Firmware is installed for audio.

sections.title: Intel Turbo Boost and eGPU Stuttering
sections.content: When connected to an external PCIe device (eGPU), Intel Turbo Boost may cause micro-stuttering. The stuttering appears to be related to how the CPUâ€™s power or frequency scaling interacts with the eGPU, which does not occur when using the internal display. To resolve this issue, disable Intel Turbo Boost in the Performance section of the UEFI firmware.
